SummaryEnglish: Tsutomu's parents passed away several years ago, before that they ran a flower shop. Now it's run by his older brother's wife, Mai, and he is living with them while attending the local college. When Tsutomu's brother gets transferred to another city, Mai is left alone and the only person around to help out is Tsutomu. Due to this fact, Mai is starting to feel that certain needs are very unfulfilled. Tsutomu realizes this and his feelings for Mai begin to surface.
